analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/21/0x1cb82f4228719a53a6f5fc98de74f12eebdc31ed.sol:
	Contract Fusionchain has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/21/0x1cb82f4228719a53a6f5fc98de74f12eebdc31ed.sol#276)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
